description:
"After taking this course, I earned $1,500 in my second month selling on Amazon!"

~Mike Daugherty, Student

If you have struggled making money online, if you have no idea where to start, if the thought of starting an online business scares you; then this is the class for you!

In this course I will teach you the exact methods I use to earn an extra $3,000-$4,000 per month working part time by selling items through a program called Amazon FBA. You will learn how I failed at many businesses before discovering, what I call the Holy Grail of online selling - Amazon FBA.

This course (unlike others) is taught by someone who is actually making money from Amazon FBA month after month! I walk you through the process from start to finish!

After taking this course you will learn:

  • What Amazon FBA is
  • How to buy items low and sell high, on Amazon FBA
  • The exact the tools I use to earn my money
  • How you can do this business on the side

Additionally, you will learn from someone who is actually doing this month after month. I learned the hard way through trial and error...if you take this course, I will save you hours of research and frustration trying to figure out everything on your own. I also give you updates on my earnings and much more.

So join the 600+ satisfied students who have taken action, started selling on Amazon FBA, and are changing their lives today!
title: Amazon FBA: How to Set Up a Fulfilling Part-Time Business
